metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30473 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
aom_image.c in libaom in AOMedia before 2021-04-07 frees memory that is not located on the heap.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.6.1-1
libaom3 - 3.6.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.1-1').
